commonFiles: glob paths to files to be included in all archive versions of the module
folder hierarchy can be forced to a certain level by using @() operator, i.e. ...qt/plugins/@(platforms)/qminimal.dll will archive qminimal.dll into a platforms folder

files: glob paths to files only pertaining this platform and architecture
